text: Eberhard Kummer (2 August 1940 â€“ 12 July 2019) was an Austrian folk singer and lawyer. He was an expert of medieval music. Kummer was born in Krems an der Donau, Austria. He played the hurdy-gurdy, the harp and the guitar, and made important works to medieval music and the Austrian folksong. Kummer died on 12 July 2019 in Vienna at the age of 78.Bassbariton Eberhard Kummer ist gestorben ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Austrian singers Category:Austrian lawyers
title: Eberhard Kummer
